basic_attack.damage: weapon damage + stats + modifier, within range

power_strike.damage: weapon damage + stats + modifier, within range
power_strike.effect: high damage, chance to stun target for x turns

shield_block.effect: reduces incoming damage by 50% for x turns

dodge.effect: increases chance to dodge attacks by x% for y turns

mirror image.effect: creates a duplicate of the player. Attacks have a chance to hit the duplicate instead of the player for x turns.  You may have any number of these duplicates active at once.

A thousand cuts.damage: weapon damage + stats + modifier, within range
A thousand cuts.effect: applies x stacks of bleed to target, dealing y% of weapon damage each turn for z turns

Poisoned blade.damage: weapon damage + stats + modifier, within range
Poisoned blade.effect: applies x stacks of poison to target, dealing y% of weapon damage each turn for z turns

Adrenaline rush.effect: restores x endurance immediately and an additional y endurance each turn for z turns, at a cost of reducing maximum health by w% for the duration

fireball.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range

fire bolt.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
fire bolt.effect: ignites ignitable targets for x turns for y damage per turn

fire wall.effect: creates a wall of fire that gives the player high fire thorns damage

ice shard.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
ice shard.effect: lowers target dexterity for x turns

ice storm.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
ice storm.effect: medium damage, hits all targets, chance to freeze targets for x turns

ice barrier.effect: creates a barrier that absorbs x amount of damage

lightning strike.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
lightning strike.effect: medium damage, chance to stun target for x turns

chain lightning.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
chain lightning.effect: hits primary target and jumps to y additional targets

lightning shield.effect: creates a shield that stuns attackers for 1 turn and possibly shocks them, increasing damage taken

shock.damage: none, applies x levels of shock to target
shock.effect: (100 / target shock stacks + 1)% chance to stun target for 1 turn, increases damage taken for [shock stacks] turns

heal.healing: magic healing + stats + modifier, within range

holy strike.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
holy strike.effect: medium damage, extra damage to undead targets, chance to blind target for x turns

blessing.effect: increases player's stats for x turns

vine whip.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
vine whip.effect: low damage, chance to entangle target for x turns, which gives a flat 50% chance to miss attacks and negates all bonuses to chance to hit

earthquake.damage: magic damage + stats + modifier, within range
earthquake.effect: medium damage, hits all targets, chance to stun targets for x turns

wall of thorns.effect: creates a shield that reduces incoming damage by 50% and deals low thorn damage to attackers

regeneration.healing: magic healing + stats + modifier, within range
regeneration.effect: restores health over time for x turns

vampiric strike.damage: weapon damage + stats + modifier, within range
vampiric strike.effect: heals for x% of damage dealt

dark pact.effect: sacrifice x% of current health to restore y% of max mana each turn for y turns.  Can kill player.

infusion.effect: convert x% of mana to endurance each turn for y turns

last stand.effect: sacrifice all but one life to deal massive damage to all enemies.  You are stunned for 1 turn after using this ability.

edge of madness.effect: deal random damage between 0 and double your max health to target. Take damage equal to half the damage dealt (this damage cannot be prevented or reduced). Gain life, mana or stamina equal to 10% of damage dealt, *after* damage is taken.

gentleman's agreement.effect: Your maximum life is halved and your opponent loses maximum life equal to the maximum life you lost.  This can kill your opponent.

steal fate.effect: For x turns, y% of damage dealt to enemies is also dealt to their maximum life.  This can kill enemies. You gain an equivalent amount of maximum life but do not heal the gained maximum life.
